attributes.action: CUT SHOPPING HOURS / SAVE THE WORLD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we urge the prime minister to change the law so non-food stores close at 5.30pm and supermarkets to close at 9pm as the amount of electricity being used when there are so few people shopping would make a considerable difference to emmissions and climate change.
people can already shop 7 days a week and do not need to shop through the night.
